price: ߊ߲ ߡߊ߫ ߣߌ߲߬ ߡߍ߲߫ ߣߊߡߎ߲߫ ߞߐߟߕߊ ߘߐ߫ ߝߋߎ߫ ߸ ߣߌ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߝߏߦߌ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߝߏ߫ ߞߎ߲߬ߘߐ߬ߕߍ߰ߟߌ
arabic: مَا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَٰذَا فِي ٱلۡمِلَّةِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخۡتِلَٰقٌ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: mā samiʿ'nā bihādhā fī al-milati al-ākhirati in hādhā illā ikh'tilāqun
